html:
12.24.20  9:27 pm   When is your new video NOT coming out?

      tuesday march 19, 2019

12.24.20  9:04 pm   How do you make songs

      impossible. it can't be done

12.24.20  7:25 pm   did you get the leaf you wanted for christmas?

      no but i got a different one which is smaller but it's still pretty good

12.24.20  7:16 pm   how to love

      i'm not sure. can't remember all the ways. i think i have determined the way i like to do it is to keep forgetting and then remembering again

12.24.20  7:05 pm   Hi Bill, hope all is going well for ya. Ever since I was young I've had snippets of melodies and music enter my brain and suddenly leave. I suck at turning what I hear internally into something tangible without forgetting it halfway. How do you keep track of it?

      what i do is record a quick audio memo as soon as the idea arrives. if i have a keyboard with me, that helps because that makes it easy to clarify any chords it has in it, and if not i will have to just explain it all with my voice

12.24.20  6:50 pm   When you are making fills, like in 'mt. Saint Helens is gonna blow up' when you sang "everything is going to fall down to the ground and turn grey" do you usually think of the melody first and then harmonize the melody or do you think more about the chords then write melody?

      the lyric+melody occur together, as a package deal, with the chords included also

12.24.20  6:31 pm   ever wished writers wrote shorter stories? 

      yes

12.24.20  6:21 pm   What is your favorite song that you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

12.24.20  5:51 pm   Hi Bill. I'm in love with the harmony in your songs. Do you have any jazz harmony book that you would suggest to have a better understanding of your particular style?

     no, but, those could be useful if you want to build a fort, of books

12.24.20  5:05 pm   oh yeah? explain instrumental music

      it always relates to a piece of non music. this piece of non-music serves as a delivery vehicle for the music

12.24.20  4:36 pm   are you able to predict the future

      partially

12.24.20  3:55 pm   do you generally come up with music first or lyrics first 

      both at the same time

12.24.20  3:52 pm   You are an inspiration for aspiring artists

      that's friendly of you, but i am looking to do it even more

12.24.20  3:04 pm   When it comes to writing the chord progressions you do, what is the most effective process you use?

     use melodies and lyrics also

      I'm currently going through music school, and I really want to explore more unorthodox writing styles.

      This might not be what you want to hear, but, ..................... you're gonna have to just make things up

12.24.20  2:57 pm   how do i win at everything

      everyone's gonna win. it's gonna be a tie

12.24.20  2:14 pm   Why did our hero in "and the day goes on" travelled straight to the sun? that's dangerous...

      this is just how the songs starts. this is for those mornings when you immediately wake up feeling everything at the same time

12.24.20  1:06 pm   what is your favorite christmas tradition?

      checking out some tchaikovsky

12.24.20  11:49 am   Is there a reason that the letters of the word reality in this website has all the same colours unlike other words ?

      most of the titles have a small percentage of their letters different. so, by that same style, a small percentage of the titles are different from this, in that they have none of their letters different

12.24.20  10:09 am   in "outside" did you say 'moon' and used it as a note or sounds or something. i am not that knowledgeable about music but i hope you understand my question.

      that's a lyric, in the vocals. i just recorded it using my voice, normal style

12.24.20  9:52 am   if you had any super power what would it be?

      holding a conversation

12.24.20  9:15 am   What inspired you to make music?

      must have been music itself

12.24.20  9:07 am   When generating writing ideas, do you write entire songs the whole time

     no

      or do you generate ideas until they're enough of a thing to be called an idea?

      just enough

12.24.20  8:49 am   Are you also thinking about eggs

      no

12.24.20  6:53 am   How to understand normal social interaction?

      pretend everyone else is you from another time

12.24.20  4:45 am   Are you making a new video?

      yes but what's more important is i will be making many more videos after that

12.24.20  3:42 am   Do you know how awesome you are?

      it's going to take me some time to grow into my expectations

12.24.20  3:12 am   what's a place you would want to eventually visit

      ur

12.24.20  1:40 am   What is better? To write lyrics from listening beat, or starting a project from scratch all together.

      that depends whether you like to seize the flow of time in the palm of your hand and begin spewing it in poetic quantities

12.24.20  1:25 am   dude ngl your songs are pretty epic

      we'll see about that

12.24.20  12:37 am   What is your opinion on nihilism?

      fake

12.24.20  12:36 am   If light is the fastest thing in the universe then how did the dark get there first

      because dark is nothing. nothing is faster than light

12.24.20  12:30 am   What is egg?

      some type of yellow slime which could have been someone

12.24.20  12:10 am   Dearest Bill,
Me wonderest if thou hast ever comsumethed a singular blade of grass in thine lifetime?

     no i haven't

     Cordially and sincerely,
Me

12.23.20  11:31 pm   Why are data singular?

      data is plural. 1 piece of data would be a..... datum

12.23.20  11:13 pm   Your music is really something, what inspired you to choose this style of music/video editing

      basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

12.23.20  11:00 pm   Hi Bill! Who is your favorite art person?

      could be you

12.23.20  9:33 pm   If your song is 100% complete, does that mean it's coming out soon?

     it is supposed to mean that, but the video has taken a long time, purely because i'm an idiot

     Maybe a Christmas Special?

     every day is special

12.23.20  9:17 pm   have you ever considered writing an entire song in pig latin?

      no

12.23.20  9:14 pm   is you next project coming soon?

      yes

12.23.20  7:52 pm   Since your song is finished (per an earlier answer), will it be released before the end of the year?

      it's not important to me what year it is when any song is released. the only thing i care about is that i can release hundreds and possibly thousands of songs over the course of my life time. the reason my current song is not released yet is because i am still working on the video for it

12.23.20  7:40 pm   how do you stop worrying about current events

      start thinking of some future events to worry about

12.23.20  7:16 pm   Which came first the fruit orange or the color orange

      the fruit

12.23.20  4:05 pm   The style of the relationship between your lyrics and music to me seems pretty similar to Paul Simon's. He often talks about a lot of his greatest hits having lyrics that simply sounded right and have the feeling that the music has, rather than having lyrics that have been agonized over for a long time, like Mrs. Robinson. Something I hear him say a lot is "I don't really know what that meant when I wrote it, but later I realized..." Is that in any way your process of writing lyrics, that the goal is that they sound like the music? Or do you craft them to both sound right for the music and mean something intentional and consciously thought of?

      every point in our universe means everything. science tells us this (was it science? maybe it was something else. i honestly can't remember how i know this). I've found songs to be one of the most potent ways to explore this

12.23.20  3:10 pm   When is your next video coming out or does it not have any date for release yet?

      every time i have tried to figure out a date, i have been wrong. so it doesn't really matter what date i say. it won't be right

12.23.20  2:42 pm   are u on break rn

      no

12.23.20  12:57 pm   are you done editing your next video

      no

12.23.20  12:51 pm   is it possible to think and write a song at the same time?

      yes, as long as you are not thinking about the song. if you are thinking about something else, the song should go very well

12.23.20  12:25 pm   Are u a human?

      oh that would explain this tingling sensation i've been having

12.23.20  11:34 am   what do you want for christmas

      maybe a leaf

12.23.20  11:20 am   will you take a long break after your next video?

      that's the opposite of what i would like
